verbs.description: relationship between mistletoe and [V: spruce] the sight of a ragged witches broom in a dark spruce in a snow - covered boreal wood can be arresting and even foreboding often this bundle of excess growth signifies a mortal spruce quebec northeastern united states arctic mistletoe adrian tanner
